title: HUPO-PSI mzSpecLib spectral library specification
description: Describe library, spectrum, and spectrum-component attributes

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the spectral library

clusters.description: A list of clustered spectra contained in the spectral library or externally referenced

spectra.description: A list of spectra contained in the spectral library

cvparam.description: A controlled vocabulary term with an optional associated value, which may itself be a cvparam

accession.description: The accession number of the external controlled vocabulary term

name.description: The human readable name of the controlled vocabulary term

value_accession.description: The accession number of the external controlled vocabulary term describing the value of this cvparam

cv_param_group.description: An identifier connecting a group of related parameters

attribute_sets.description: A collection of controlled vocabulary terms associated with some label

id.description: A identifier number unique within the spectrum entry for interpretations

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the interpretation

member_interpretations.description: Additional attributes to describe each member analyte within the context of this interpretation

id.description: A identifier number corresponding to the analyte this interpretation member describes

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the interpretation member

analyte.description: A molecule that is believed to have generated or contributed to the spectrum

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the analyte

id.description: A identifier number unique within the spectrum entry for analytes

spectrum.description: A mass spectrum entry in the library

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the spectrum

analytes.description: The analytes described by this spectrum. Empty if the analytes are unknown.

mzs.description: The m/z values of each peak in the spectrum

intensities.description: The intensity values of each peak in the spectrum

peak_annotations.description: The peak annotations, if any, of each peak in the spectrum

anyOf.description: A string representation for a peak annotation

aggregations.description: The aggregation statistics, if any, of each peak in the spectrum

cluster.description: A cluster of mass spectra either in the library or stored externally

attributes.description: A list of controlled vocabulary terms describing the spectrum cluster
